name: Hand in Hand (MantaoGames, TheTrueDuck, golemstudios)
description:
Dodge spikes, boulders, and meteors as you try to form the largest chain of people holding hands!

When you move around, your entire chain of people will follow you, so be sure to keep them out of harm's way.  Along the way, you may pick up some special individuals who will help protect your group, such as the kingdom's finest knights in shining armor, or even the King himself!

Made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Joined Together".

Credits

Lucas  Denhof - Programming/Music

Flavio Arrigoni - Programming

Kevin Mantao - Art

Extra font : LIL MRKR
